mapper.select: select label_cn from district where cuid = #{id}

SELECT T.CUID AS RELATED_OLT_CUID,T.DEV_IP RELATED_OLT_DEVIP,D.LABEL_CN AS DLABEL_CN, '' LOGICID,'' CVLAN,T.LABEL_CN AS RELATED_OLT_NAME, N.NATIVE_NAME AS EMS_NAME,T.STANDARD_NAME AS STANDARD_NAME FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T,NMS_SYSTEM N,device_vendor d WHERE T.CUID = #{id} AND n.cuid =t.related_ems_cuid AND D.CUID=T.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID
select trp.* from t_sf_rofh_product ts, t_rofh_precover_activate trp where trp.related_order_cuid = ts.related_order_cuid and ts.finish_time < to_date('2018-05-15 00:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
